items.name: GenericWelcome
items.description: Hello there, traveler!

items.name: FormalGreeting
items.description: Greetings. How may I assist you?

items.name: WarmWelcome
items.description: Welcome, friend! It's wonderful to see you!

items.name: GruffAcknowledgment
items.description: What do you want?

items.name: SuspiciousQuestion
items.description: Who are you? What brings you here?

items.name: EnthusiasticHello
items.description: Well met! What adventures bring you to these parts?

items.name: WearyGreeting
items.description: Another traveler... What is it you need?

items.name: HumbleWelcome
items.description: Oh, hello. I'm nobody important, but how can I help?

items.name: ArrogantAcknowledgment
items.description: Ah, someone seeking my expertise, no doubt.

items.name: NervousStammer
items.description: Oh! Um, h-hello... Can I... help you?

items.name: MysteriousWhisper
items.description: Ah, fate brings us together... How curious.

items.name: LoudHail
items.description: HO THERE, FRIEND! WELCOME!

items.name: BusinessLike
items.description: State your business.

items.name: WittyRemark
items.description: Well, well! Another hero looking for glory or gold?

items.name: GuardedResponse
items.description: I don't know you. Keep your distance.

items.name: ReligiousBlessing
items.description: May the gods smile upon you, traveler.

items.name: ScholarlyInquiry
items.description: Greetings! Might you have any knowledge to share?

items.name: MilitarySharpness
items.description: Stand and state your purpose!

items.name: MerchantPitch
items.description: Welcome, welcome! Looking to buy or sell today?

items.name: ExhaustedSigh
items.description: *sigh* Yes? What is it?

items.name: NobleGreeting
items.description: Good day. I trust you come with good intentions?

items.name: StreetSmart
items.description: Hey there, stranger. You new around here?

items.name: KindlyOffer
items.description: Hello, dear. You look like you could use some help.

items.name: BrusqueDismissal
items.description: I'm busy. Make it quick.

items.name: PhilosophicalMusing
items.description: Ah, another soul wandering this strange world...

items.name: DrunkSlur
items.description: Heeey there, pal! *hic* How'sh it goin'?

items.name: ChildlikeWonder
items.description: Ooh! A real adventurer! Are you here to save us?

items.name: CynicalRemark
items.description: Let me guess... you need something.

items.name: VeteranRespect
items.description: I can see you've seen battle. Welcome, warrior.

items.name: SecretiveWhisper
items.description: Pssst... over here. I have something to tell you...

patterns: select greeting based on NPC personality trait
background influences greeting style (soldier vs merchant)

metadata.usage: Select greeting matching NPC's primary personality trait and background
